entry.title: PPLNS with job declaration
entry.summary: The inquiry raises a pertinent question regarding the methodology employed for calculating new slices, specifically whether the delta used in this process is dynamic or remains static. This aspect seems to be at the discretion of the pool or individual responsible for implementing the payout schema. Additionally, there's an acknowledgment of a previous discussion with @plebhash, where the sender reevaluates their stance, suggesting that their initial perspective might have been incorrect. This admission underscores the complexity and nuances involved in determining the approach for slice calculation, highlighting the ongoing dialogue and reconsideration among programmers engaged in this domain.
